near1013: The ruins are in the east!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_00>I heard there's a place out in the desert
with huge statues that are all facing
each other.
Have any of your customers ever
mentioned seeing something like that
while they're surfing the dunes?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmmm...<sp:5:0:0> Hard to say. The desert has its
share of statues and ruins, and of course
the Upheaval really changed things too.
Do you have any more information to go
on? Maybe a <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff> or something?
talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>If you think that's best, then we can do
that. We probably don't want to wander
too far and get lost...
OK. Time to head back to town and start
our search over?
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Ease_00>Oh! Excellent!<sp:5:0:0> In that case, let's
get going!
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>OK, back to town we go! It's a good
idea not to push ourselves too hard
in the desert.
Sarq for doing as much as you have.<sp:5:0:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0801>And really, it's not like we're giving up.
We're just starting fresh!
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_00>I did have one,<sp:5:0:0> but the wind caught it and
blew it off to who-knows-where...

I know for sure that it's in the eastern
part of the desert though. <sp:5:0:0>And like I said,
the <clr:0000>huge statues<clr:ffff> face each other.
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sad_01>It helps to know it's in the east, but...
Well, the desert is really,<sp:5:0:0> really big.
talk0051: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>I see...<sp:5:0:0> In that case, let's get going!
talk0034: <sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?! What was that?<sp:5:0:0> It startled me...
talk0018:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Sorry, I need to get back to work...


If you figure out where you need to go,
come back and see me. <sp:5:0:0>I'll be happy to
rent a sand seal to you for the trip!
talk0052:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>All right, I'll be waiting for you here.
Come and talk to me once you're ready!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hey...<sp:5:0:0> If you need something, just come
talk to me about it, OK?
talk0053:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>Oh, OK. If that's what you want, then
that's what we'll do.<sp:5:0:0> Better to be safe
than to overdo it and have an accident.
I'll go ahead and get off the sleigh seal
then, OK?
talk0019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Sarq! Now that I'm here, I can really
start my investigation!

Oh! <sp:5:0:0>And of course I have to reward you
for your help!
talk0054:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>But it's not like we're giving up or
anything! Let's start over!
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>That was close...


<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm glad that neither one of us was
seriously injured...<sp:5:0:0> But could you please
try to be a little safer?
talk0038:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>All right! Let's get going to those ruins!<sp:5:1:0>
Relatively safely, if possible!
talk0055:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>That was terrifying!<sp:5:0:0> I can't believe the
sleigh caught fire!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm glad we made it back safely, but
maybe next time we can avoid fire, yeah?
talk0039:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:QuestionNormal_01>OK, that's no problem. Come talk to me
when you're ready to go, OK?
talk0056:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Ah, I see you've gotten a sleigh seal
ready! Sarq!

Hrm, but it doesn't look like it's quite
ready to travel the desert...

Let me know when it's in good enough
condition to travel to the ruins!
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>I can tell right away that this place will be
worth a really thorough look. I've got my
work cut out for me!
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>It's already interesting. Rotana said these were
supposed to be ruins of the seven heroines here,
so where have the other two gone?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Hey! You! You look like you've done your
fair share of exploring!

Have you ever seen massive ruins with
<clr:0000>huge statues facing each other<clr:ffff>? It'd be...
in the eastern part of the desert, I think?
I lost my map, so I don't know exactly
where they are...

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Does that sound familiar?<sp:5:0:0> If you know
what I'm talking about, I'd appreciate it if
you could take me there on a <clr:0000>sleigh seal<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Exploration expenses were paid in
advance, so I'd obviously reward you if
you helped me!
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>I'm supposed to investigate ruins in the
eastern part of the desert...

And there are <clr:0000>huge statues there that
face one another<clr:ffff>. But that's all
I remember.
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease_00>I lost the map that marked exactly where
the ruins were, so I'm in a tough spot
right now...
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you know where these ruins are, I'd
really, really appreciate you giving me a
lift there on a <clr:0000>sleigh seal<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I was paid in advance, so I'd obviously
reward you if you helped me!
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Think_00>No, no, that's OK.<sp:5:1:0>


It's a minor location that most Gerudo
don't know about, so it'd be silly to
expect a Hylian to be able to take me.
talk0040: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Ah! You're the one who's going to help!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Sarq!<sp:5:0:0> OK, let's not waste any more time!


Can I go ahead and hop on the sleigh?
talk0041:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>You said you'd take me to the ruins with
the <clr:0000>huge statues facing each other<clr:ffff> that's
in the <clr:0000>eastern<clr:ffff> part of the desert.
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Would it be all right for me to get on the
<clr:0000>sleigh seal<clr:ffff> you rented?
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Sarq!<sp:5:0:0> In that case, I'll wait for you over
at the east gate.

Come find me once you've got a <clr:0000>sleigh
seal<clr:ffff> ready to go!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Sarq!<sp:5:0:0> In that case, I'll wait for you 
right here.

Come and talk to me once you've got a
<clr:0000>sleigh seal<clr:ffff> ready to go!
talk0043:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>This is another statue, right? It's fallen
over though...

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>OK!<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure this is the place I was asked
to investigate!
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:QuestionNormal_00>You said you'd take me to the ruins with
the <clr:0000>huge statues facing each other<clr:ffff> that
are in the <clr:0000>eastern<clr:ffff> part of the desert.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I told you I'd reward you for your help,
right? I wasn't kidding!

So...<sp:5:0:0>please...<sp:5:0:0> Could you get a <clr:0000>sleigh seal<clr:ffff>
for us to travel with?
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>I see you've prepared a sleigh seal. <sp:5:0:0>Sarq!


Is it OK for me to hop on?
talk0045:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseM_01>Oh... The reins broke...


<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>Well...<sp:5:0:0> I don't think you'll be able to take
me to the ruins in this state.

We'd better head back, get some new
reins, and try again.
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>We should be heading toward the <clr:0000>eastern<clr:ffff>
part of the desert, to ruins where <clr:0000>huge
statues<clr:ffff> face each other.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>I'm sorry... If I hadn't lost my map, this
would be a lot easier.
talk0046:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Sarq for your hard work!<sp:5:0:0> I'm sure it'll go
well next time!
talk0047:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_00>Wait, really?<sp:5:0:0> Well, I guess you must
have your reasons...

<sp:3:0:2:0101>All right, then I'll head back to town for
now.<sp:5:0:0> But please take me to the ruins
when you have a chance, OK?
